issue.title: [C++/Gandiva] Support detecting correct LLVM version in Homebrew
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4290](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4290). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should also search in homebrew for the matching LLVM version for Gandiva on OSX. You can install it via `brew install llvm@6`.
